## Load required library
  
```{r warning=FALSE, echo = TRUE, results = 'hide', warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(data.table)
library(plyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggpubr)
library(ggpointdensity)
library(ggrepel)
library(stringr)
library(dplyr)
library(segmented)
library(maftools)
theme_set(theme_bw())
```

## Read in somatic mutation data


```{r}
path = "~/research/data/COVID/"
fnm  = "seurat_COVID19_Neutrophils_cohort1_10x_jonas_FG_2020-08-19.rds"
neu  = readRDS(paste0(path, fnm))
dim(neu)
slotNames(neu)
dat = neu@assays$RNA

```
